import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Button, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import products from '../products' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { listProductsDetails } from "../actions/productActions"; function ProductScreen({ match }) { const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(() => { dispatch(listProductsDetails(match.params.id)) },[]) let product = {} return (
Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description: ${product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out fo Stock'}
) } export default ProductScreen
